title: Community and Public profiles
content:
# Community and Public profiles

Introducing Mobbin Community â€” A new way to discover beautiful collections curated by fellow Mobbin members.

Alongside our new Community page, we are also launching Public profiles*. Your profile will be publicly available at mobbin.com/@{username}, where you can showcase your collections.

## Other improvements

- Collections are now public by default.
- You can now search for apps from other platforms in the search bar.
- You can now see the number of comments a screen or flow has on the Saved page as well as on your Collection pages.
- We've improved the empty state for search results to suggest other popular filters.

## Fixes

- Fixed an issue where the screen watermarks were not rendering correctly.
- Fixed an issue where filters were not persisted when switching platforms.
- Public profiles are completely optional, and your team collections will never appear on your profile.
